Sets of coefficients to minimize the relative errors of
the following approximation to erfc(x):
     q(x) = exp(-x**2) * t(x) * P_N(t(x)),
where
     t(x) = 1 / (1 + p * x),
     P_N(X) = a_00 + a_01 * X + ... + a_N * X ** N,
     x \in [0, \infty).

Reference
C. Hastings, Jr., Approximations for Digital Computers,
Princeton University Press, Princeton (1955).

--------------
N = 1
 a_00 =  0.429843800057161727064061025324542393
 a_01 =  0.570156199942838272935938974675457607
 p    =  0.773532100083518258763549397022724885
max_rel_err = 0.01506569848
--------------

 p    =  0.546623162533081225186935967385645029
